mapper.select: select room.* from CHAT_ROOM_TB room, CHAT_MEMBER_TB mem WHERE room.CHATROOM_NUM_PK = mem.CHATROOM_NUM_FK_PK and MEMBER_ID_FK = #{member}
mapper.insert: insert into CHAT_ROOM_TB(MEMBER_ID_FK, CHATROOM_NAME, CHATROOM_LAST_CHAT) values(#{member}, #{roomName}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
insert into CHAT_MEMBER_TB(CHATROOM_NUM_FK_PK, MEMBER_ID_FK_PK, CHATMEMBER_ENTER_DT, CHATMEMBER_ROLE) values(#{roomNum}, #{member}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{role})
mapper.delete: delete from CHAT_MEMBER_TB where CHATROOM_NUM_FK_PK = #{roomNum} and MEMBER_ID_FK_PK = #{member}
mapper.insert: insert into MESSAGE_TB(CHATROOM_NUM_FK, MEMBER_ID_FK, MESSAGE_DT, MESSAGE, MESSAGE_TYPE) values (#{roomNum}, #{member}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{msg}, #{type})
mapper.select: select msg.*, m.MEMBER_NICK, m.MEMBER_PROFILE from MESSAGE_TB msg left join MEMBER_TB m on msg.MEMBER_ID_FK = m.MEMBER_ID_PK where CHATROOM_NUM_FK = #{roomNum} order by msg.MESSAGE_DT ASC
select c.*, m.MEMBER_NICK, m.MEMBER_PROFILE from CHAT_MEMBER_TB c left join MEMBER_TB m on c.MEMBER_ID_FK_PK = m.MEMBER_ID_PK where CHATROOM_NUM_FK_PK = #{roomNum}
select CHATMEMBER_ROLE from CHAT_MEMBER_TB where CHATROOM_NUM_FK_PK = #{roomNum} and MEMBER_ID_FK_PK = #{id}
